main.bio: Hi, I'm Sabbir Rifat a Full Stack ReactJS Developer. As a tenacious self-taught programmer, I use continuous iteration to produce results quickly and continuously improve products.

testimonials.text: It's so easy to working with Sabbir. He can understand the problems so easily. Highly recommended for everyone
He is one of best developer I have ever seen. He easily understood what I wanted to build. Completed my whole ecom site wihin a month.
